mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from mmso_1round where ${param1} like '%${param2}%' and mcn_no = ${param3} and m1_active = 0 and m1_round_ck = 2
select count(*) cnt from mmso_2round where ${param1} like '%${param2}%' and mcn_no = ${param3} and m2_active = 0 and m2_round_ck = 3
select * from mmso_comp_no order by mcn_no desc

select A.* from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, m1.*, mm.m_birthday FROM mmso_1round m1, mmso_member2 mm, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where ${param2} like '%${param3}' and m1_active = 0 and m1_round_ck = 2 and m1.m1_memberno = mm.memberno and mcn_no = ${param5} ) A order by m_birthday desc

select A.* from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, m2.*, mm.m_birthday FROM mmso_2round m2, mmso_member2 mm, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where ${param2} like '%${param3}' and m2_active = 0 and m2_round_ck = 3 and m2.m2_memberno = mm.memberno and mcn_no = ${param5} ) A order by m_birthday desc

select A.* from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, ent.* , m1_round_ck, m1_1roundpoint, m1_2roundpoint, m1_3roundpoint, m1_4roundpoint, m1_1roundtime, m1_2roundtime, m1_3roundtime, m1_4roundtime FROM mmso_enter_test ent, mmso_1round m1, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where ent_active = 0 and ent.ent_idx = m1.ent_idx and ent.mcn_no = #{mcn_no} ) A order by ent_birthday desc
